description: Provide a dedicated view that shows all Kanban items currently in the 'Now' column across all boards. Display items in a list with checkbox, name, description, importance indicator, and effort indicator. When a user checks the checkbox, the item is automatically moved to the 'Completed' column.
title: Unified 'Now' view across all boards
